meaningMnemonic: When art <kanji>resemble</kanji>s the <kanji>image</kanji> of a person, it's a <vocabulary>portrait</vocabulary>. And it doesn't just resemble them, it captures their image perfectly. Now that's what I call a portrait.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
